result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Cameron Wayne Ghost

records.addlTxt: Defendant Cameron Wayne Ghost not in court.  Benjamin James Webster appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Donna Burger appears in court. 2:14 p.m. AO-Clerk. Defendant does not appear. State requests warrant. Ct issues warrant geo to WI*. 2:15 p.m. adj.
Adjourned initial appearance on April 4, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Not to have contact with:  D.K.G. or at the premises occupied by D.K.G..  Allowed one trip with Law Enforcement to residence to obtain personal belongings.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  Not to possess or consume alcohol.  No controlled substances without a prescription and only in amount/frequency as prescribed.  Subject to testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion.  Defendant shall give written notice to the Clerk of this Court within 24 hours of any changes of address or telephone number.

Holly D. Wood Webster appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Cameron Wayne Ghost appeared by video means from the PCJ.  Donna Burger appeared by video means.   BJM-clerk  1:35 pm  CT provides options to Def on obtaining counsel.  Pet for CT Appt'd Atty form to be provided.  State req low cash or high signature bond.  CT sets Bond.  Bond cont. 1:43 pm adj.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 4, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
